title: (1) of section 15 of the Finance (Covid-19 and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (Covid-19 and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (Covid-19 and Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2022 (Section 15(1)) (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance (covid-19 miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (section 15(1)) (commencement) order 2023

title: (1) of section 15 of the Finance (Covid-19 and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 2. The 5th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which subsection
text_raw:
2. The 5th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which subsection 
(1) of section 15 of the Finance (Covid-19 and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2022 (No. 9 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 March, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [135] 3
